Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: John Cline
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. nothing special nighttime is a pain if you have low voltage lighting. star burst obstruct the image when the IR is on. Interior of cover needs to be recoated with something antiglare. Daytime is good though adjustable manually zoom, and focus are a touchy to adjust have a tablet or phone to view your adjustments. be sure to put the cover on before you get off the ladder.

ProductInfo.Features:
Color CCD technology, color DSP, automatic CDS image sensor
Build in f 4-9mm Varifocal Lens.Lens adjustment: horizontal rotation of 355 degrees and vertical rotation of 45 degrees by manual
Signal to noise ratio: 48dB (AGC Off). Mini illumination: 0 Lux (IR LEDs on)
420 horizontal Lines.17 Infrared LEDs. IR range: 20m
Auto electronic shutter control. Auto switch of color and black / white modes.Three dimensional bracket
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Color CCD Infrared Night Vision Home Security Camera 4-9mm Varifocal Lens for CCTV DVR Surveillance System with bonus Security Warning Decal 1Z4
